description:
With an amazing soundtrack, explosive visuals and simple controls, Galactic Defence Squadron is an addictive and challenging shooter which harks back to arcade classics of old. 

FEATURES
- Endless waves of enemies that increase in difficulty & number the further you progress
-Collect Asteroid Gold to replenish your health or load the Ursa Major's super powered Solar Cannon
- Every game is different, enemies spawn in different locations and will vary their attacks each time.
- Different enemy types mean you need a clear strategy, go for the ships attacking the Ursa Major or defend yourself first?
- A glorious soundtrack from up and coming musician Harry Burt
- Tutorial mode to ease you into the action
- Addictive gameplay, can you beat your high score?
name: Galactic Defence Squadron
intro: Galactic Defence Squadron is a top-down endless twin-stick shooter. Your only goal is to defend the mining vessel Ursa Major!
